about_the_game:
Hot Sauna is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will find an exciting adventure of Jack's boyfriend in the sauna. He comes there to have fun with his girlfriends. The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance.

In this wonderful game you will plunge into the story of the guy Jack, who came to the sauna to fuck his girlfriends. Sarah and Sheila are two very good friends who just had sex in the sauna. They were later joined by their friend Jack. What happened next you will see in the game. Get real enjoyment from very simple gameplay and cool music.

Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Hot Sauna

  • OS *: Windows XP or higher

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
